title: Spam Protection
description: This rule detects repeated characters in a message.

title: Profanity Filter
description: This rule blocks offensive words.

title: Link Detection
description: This rule detects URLs and prevents user from posting links.

title: Mention Spam Detection
description: This rule blocks users from spamming mentions.

title: Caps Lock Detection
description: This rule detects if a message is written in all capital letters.

title: Discord Invite Link Detection
description: This rule detects Discord invite links in messages.

title: Role Mention Blocker
description: This rule blocks role mentions.

title: .zip Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks .zip links.

title: .exe Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks .exe links.

title: Inline URL Blocker
description: This rule blocks inline URLs.

title: Markdown Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks markdown links with URLs.

title: Discord Markdown Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks markdown links to Discord URLs.

title: General Markdown Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks general markdown links.

title: Multiline Markdown Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks multiline markdown links.

title: Domain Markdown Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks markdown links with domain names.

title: Unicode Combining Marks Blocker
description: This rule blocks sequences of three or more Unicode combining marks.
example: á́́ (a followed by three combining acute accents)

title: Markdown Header Blocker
description: This rule blocks markdown headers.

title: Email Address Blocker
description: This rule blocks email addresses.

title: Ping Blocker
description: This rule blocks pings of roles and members.

title: Emoji Spam Blocker
description: This rule blocks messages with more than 12 emojis.

title: Newline Spam Blocker
description: This rule blocks messages with more than 5 newlines.
example:
Line 1
Line 2
Line 3
Line 4
Line 5
Line 6

title: Discord OAuth Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks Discord OAuth links.

title: Discord Third-Party Link Blocker
description: This rule blocks Discord third-party invite links.
